'''Teyvat Spring Break''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.5]].

==How to Participate==
Travelers can choose from any of the 3 options to participate in the event. 

===Option 1===
# During the event, click the "Post Image and Text," "Post Image," or "Post Video" buttons on the event page to submit your 4-panel comic illustrations, textual edits, or fan dubbing that meet the requirements with the hashtags #TeyvatSpringBreak and #GenshinImpact.

===Option 2===
# During the event, post spring outing-themed 4-panel comic illustrations, textual edits, or fan dubbing with the hashtag #TeyvatSpringBreak on TikTok.

===Option 3===
# During the event, use the hashtags #TeyvatSpringBreak and #GenshinImpact when posting your 4-panel comic illustrations, textual edits, or fan dubbing on Twitter, Facebook, or Instagram.
# All Travelers participating in the event through Twitter, Facebook, or Instagram should click on the link below to fill out your entry information.

Please make your personal account and posts public. If the submissions for the aforementioned 3 platforms aren't entered properly or made public, they will not be accepted as part of the competition.

==Event Rules==
# Graphical: Draw Fanart or Textual Edits. Participants can choose to submit their fan made Teyvat Spring Break-themed four paneled comics or add some dialogue for the four paneled comic below. Include the hashtags #TeyvatSpringBreak and #GenshinImpact when making your submissions to any of the above platforms.
# Video/Fan Dubs: Four Panel Comic Fan Dubs or Video Edits. Participating competitors can use the following four panel comic video to create their own videos. The formatting can include, but are not limited to, fan dubs and edits. Include the hashtags #TeyvatSpringBreak and #GenshinImpact when making your submissions to any of the above platforms

Please add the hashtags in your submission, otherwise it may be deeemed invalid. There are 4 templates provided for the 4-panel comics and videos. Travelers can choose to create their work with any of the templates.

==Event Rewards==
* Winning Prize (4 Winners) &mdash; $3,000 USD
* First Prize (8 Winners) &mdash; $2,000 USD
* Second Prize (12 Winners) &mdash; $1,000 USD
* Third Prize (20 Winners) &mdash; $500 USD

During the event, all competitors who made submissions in HoYoLAB will get a "HoYoFair Exclusive Personal Page Background" and will have the opportunity to get additional Genshin Impact merchandise rewards (the same submissions can be posted on HoYoLAB and other platforms at the same time):
* Special Prize (5 Winners): we will select 5 top competitors based on the quality and popularity of their works on the HoYoLAB platform, to each receive a Klee figure.
* Participation Prize (50 Members): we will randomly select 50 competitors to each receive a Genshin Impact-themed mouse pad (random design)

==Event Notification==
The list of winners will be announced within 20 working days after the event ends. Please pay attention to the information on official social media accounts. All updates will be subject to platforms on the following accounts.
* HoYoLAB: https://www.hoyolab.com/accountCenter/postList?id=244938673
* TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@hoyocreators
* Twitter: https://twitter.com/HoYoLAB_Mimo
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HoYoLAB
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hoyocreators/

After the prizes are announced, the winners will have 10 business days to submit their prize details. Winners who miss the deadline will be deemed to have forfeited their rewards.

==Reminders==
# Publishing content not related to the event (including but not limited to advertisement links and other means of publicity) is prohibited.
# Travelers are allowed multiple submissions for this event but only one prize can be won per Traveler. The prizes cannot be stacked and only the highest prize won will be awarded.
# The event is held on multiple platforms, and winning submissions will be selected from across all platforms. The above rewards are the total rewards for all platforms. There is no amount of prizes set aside for each platform and region.
# If the same entry wins on multiple platforms, the prize will be issued according to the platform it was first posted on after final verification (only one prize will be issued).
# Plagiarism, misappropriation, and other actions that violate others' copyright are strictly prohibited. If there is a citation or a need for authorization, please cite the original sources and make sure to obtain authorization.
# The chosen submissions for this event will be selected based on content, interactivity, and influence by the HoYoLAB team.
# The list of winners will be announced within 20 business days after the event ends. Travelers, please pay attention to the official announcements in time, and submit the relevant information within 10 business days. Failure to submit the information in time will result in the forfeiture of your reward.
# After the list of winners is announced, if Travelers have any objection to the prize-winning works, they can give feedback through the customer support email or in-game customer support. If a prize-winning work is suspected of violating the event rules, we will revoke the prize and this user's account will be permanently banned from participating in any future community events.
# The costs necessary for international transfers such as administrative costs are borne by the organizer. Winners are responsible for their own tax obligations in accordance with the personal income tax policies of their country or region. The actual amount is subject to change, please refer to the laws and regulations and tax policies of your country or region.
# By participating in this event, you authorize HoYoverse to publish and exhibit your work on public platforms. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact Customer Service.
